doc:
Richard Kind https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Kind 0 Richard Bruce Kind (born November 22, 1956) is an American actor and voice actor, known for his roles in the sitcoms Mad About You (as Dr. Mark Devanow) and Spin City (as Paul Lassiter). He also does voice performances in various Pixar films such as, A Bug's Life, the Cars series, Toy Story 3, and Inside Out. Richard_Bruce_Kind ( born November_22_,_1956 ) is an_American_actor_and_voice_actor , known for his_roles in the_sitcoms_Mad About You ( as Dr._Mark_Devanow ) and Spin_City ( as Paul_Lassiter ) . He also does voice_performances in various_Pixar_films such_as , A_Bug 's_Life , the_Cars_series , Toy_Story_3 , and Inside Out .
